page.title: 04HOUSING
page.content: Crow Green is situated just north of Pilgrims Hatch.The older people say that Crow Green is an individual village,although it is not mentioned on the map of Essex of 1777,but younger inhabitants say it is a part of Pilgrims Hatch.It centres around a triangular village green at the junction of Crow Green Road,Days Lane and Ashwells Road.There are no transport services,no shops except for one or two farm shops and surprisingly no churches.The only services in Crow Green are two post boxes,with a collection once a day at 9.00am.The buildings in Crow Green were mainly bungalows,half post war and half pre war.Some pre-war bungalows had been modernized.Most of the houses were large detatched modernized buildings. Old Brentwoods new Sports Ground is now in Ashwells Lane.
